string.text: Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.
Sí, hay un amigo mío que necesita tu ayuda. Ve a verlo
Buena suerte, stalker.
Agente encubierto
Recupere los documentos que dejó un agente de Clear Sky y devuélvalos a Cold.
Uno de mis operarios me ha dejado algunos documentos en un punto de venta no marcado. Quiero que me los recuperes. Don't let anyone follow you. Si ves a alguien siguiéndolo, mátalo de inmediato.
You weren't followed here were you? Buen trabajo.
Proteger la base de Clear Sky
Elimina cualquier fuerza hostil en el área para evitar que descubra la base Clear Sky.
Ha habido un aumento de la actividad en el pantano. I can't risk having anyone blunder into our base. Quiero que limpies el área de cualquier persona hostil a Clear Sky.
Lo has hecho bien. Gracias, stalker.
Find a "%s" artefact for Cold
Cold necesita el artefacto %s.
Stalker, necesito que me traigas un artefacto.
Find me a "%s" artefact. I must procure one for study. Creo que hay propiedades que todavía no se han descubierto.
Ah, maravilloso, encontraste uno. Lo has hecho bien.
Buscar en el subterráneo de Agroprom
Los documentos militares robados están escondidos en los túneles debajo de Agroprom. Encuéntrelos y devuélvalos a Cold.

Uno de nuestros agentes ha logrado capturar documentos importantes de las Fuerzas Armadas pero fue asesinado antes de que pudiera traerlos de regreso. Actualmente están ocultos en los túneles debajo de Agroprom. Necesito que te infiltras encubiertamente en el área y los encuentres antes que los militares. Regrésalos aquí de inmediato cuando los hayas encontrado. Buena suerte.
Excelente trabajo. Lo has hecho bien.
Blood Red Sky
Kick the Renegades out of the Swamps.

So you made it. Good, we are in deep trouble. The Renegades are lurking again in the Swamps. I guess we are not the only ones who made it back after all these damn years. A group of our brave guards will join your company, we must fight them back. Good luck, stalker.
Ah, what a relief! You are a brave stalker. You have my thanks.
Obtener la siguiente tarea
Lo has hecho bien.Obtener la siguiente tarea
Recibe tu próxima tarea.Conozco a alguien que podría usar tus servicios. Ve a verlo, se sabe que paga bien.
Buena suerte, stalker.
Limpia una guardia de mutantes para Bibliotecario
Bibliotecario sabe de una guarida mutante en el área que le gustaría limpiar.
There's a mutant lair not too far from here. Ve empujándolo con un palo.
Heh, buen trabajo. Here's something for your trouble.
Consigue %s para Clear Sky
Bibliotecario me ha pedido que le traiga %s.
Podría usar tu ayuda. Provisions are running low and it's not easy getting resupplied down here.
Nosotros necesitamos.
Gran hombre, gracias.
Initiation into Clear Sky
Cold will welcome you into Clear Sky for 15,000 RU.

Yes, we've been watching you...just the right amount of curious and adventurous. Serás una buena opción para Clear Sky. However, we insist every initiate pays a 15,000 RU fee. This helps fund our research and pay our protection. ¿Qué dices?
¡Bueno! There's lots of research to be done. Go see where you can help out.
Great Swamp Clean-up
Cold wants to root out Clear Sky's enemies from the Great Swamp. Collect %s.

At first we were almost grateful that the military barged in on our bandit clean-up. Sadly, later they set up a few permanent outposts to the north. Their patrols aren't exactly friendly to our guys either, not to mention they did a shoddy job and there's a constant trickle of bandits harassing our outposts. Show them what we're made of.

At first we were almost grateful that the military barged in on our bandit clean-up. Sadly, later they set up a few permanent outposts to the north. Their patrols aren't exactly friendly to our guys either, not to mention they did a shoddy job and there's a constant trickle of bandits harassing our outposts. Show them what we're made of. Bring me some %s as proof of a job well-done.
Here you are, our professional hitman. I suppose those bastards will think twice before they dare visit our Swamp again. I hope. Here's your reward, by the way.
Night Terror
Cold wants to eliminate a dangerous mutant which roams not far away from the Hidden Base.

Mutants rarely stray close to our base. But our guys reported that the previous night some giant beast tore apart the whole team that manned the lookout tower to the north west. Four well-armed people just smeared all over the perimeter. Those weren't dogs for sure. I know you're a tough guy, so maybe you could visit the place and get rid of that nasty fucker?
Hey, great job, man! I hope this reward's good enough for you. That and the stories people'll tell.
Defend the pump station

One of our patrols captured some bandits fucking around the pump station, after a good beating they confessed they're preparing an assault. We don't know when they'll hit, I already sent some guys over there but any help is welcome... and rewarded of course.
Unnatural Selection
Collect %s samples for Professor Kalancha.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well.

Mutants of the Zone have displayed numerous peculiar adaptations to its anomalous conditions. Please, collect some tissue samples for my research. They might help us persevere in this environment as well. Collect %s samples.
The samples are in good condition. Very well, I will get to research immediately. Gracias.
Scientific Progress
Find one "%s" artefact for Professor Kalancha.
Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me?

Artefacts may provide invaluable data for our research. However, with the many threats we face our men cannot really afford to collect them for me all that often. Could you help me? Find one "%s" artefact.
Even after all these years they never cease to amaze me. What a wonderful specimen. Thank you for your assistance.
Scarce Supplies
Professor Kalancha requires %s

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock.

You see, Spore does his best to provide supplies for us. But even after all these years we are still in a difficult situation. There is no shortage of injuries to treat but our medical supplies are limited. Please, help me supplement our stock. Procure some %s, please.
We are all deeply indebted for your help.
Encuentra %s
%s is required by Professor Kalancha to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily bias is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
¡Gran trabajo! Eres mío a lo grande.
Entregar PDA a Nimble
Spore needs you to deliver an encrypted PDA to Nimble in Zaton.

De acuerdo, pez gordo. ¿Necesitar un trabajo? This PDA needs delivered to a dude who hangs out in Zaton; his name is Nimble. Él te compensará en la entrega. Don't drop it in a puddle or some dumb shit like that... or I'll have your ass. While you're there, check out what he has to offer; he can get his hands on some nice equipment... for a price.
Destroy the helicopter
Spore está harto y quiere que destruyas el helicóptero. Él te ofrecerá un descuento si lo sigues.Ese maldito helicóptero me está volviendo loco.

Tengo malos acúfenos y cada vez que esa puta cosa patrulla la frontera sur hace que mis oídos griten. I have bad tinnitus, and every time that fucking thing is patrolling the southern border, it makes my ears scream! Makes me want to bludgeon a baby flesh! Down the fucking thing and I'll give you a discount, please, before I get somebody killed.
Escort the Ecologists

Los científicos de Clear Sky lo han contratado para guiarlos a un lugar específico para estudiar. Una vez que su investigación se haya realizado con éxito, devuélvalos de forma segura al campamento; donde serás compensado

Los científicos aquí en el campamento necesitan un stalker experimentado para llevarlos al campo de estudio. ¿Estás preparado para eso? Tu trabajo es mantenerlos vivos y guiarlos a su destino. El fracaso le dará una mala reputación por aquí.
Gracias, stalker. Puede tener esto como pago por sus servicios.
Clear area of mutants

Se han detectado mutantes cerca de esta ubicación, lo que hace que el área sea peligrosa para algunos lugareños. Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar la amenaza de los mutantes dentro del área. Informe a la bibliotecaria después de que el trabajo esté terminado.
¿Eres un ávido cazador? We've been looking for someone to keep the marshes a bit safer by clearing out mutants in areas that our faction frequents. Would you like the job?
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Gracias, stalker.
Assault the bandit camp
Se te ha encomendado la tarea de eliminar la amenaza de bandidos dentro del área. Informe a la bibliotecaria después de que el trabajo esté terminado.

Tenemos un gran problema con los bandidos en el área. Those murderous thugs have been ambushing our camps outside the main base, trying to take the territory over. It'll deny us passage through many safe routes through the marshes as long as they're in the area. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. ¡Fantástico!
Aquí está su pago. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Gracias, stalker.
Encuentra %s
Despelleja mutantes recién muertos para recolectar carne de caza. Luego entrega %s a Bibliotecario en el campamento base de Clear Sky.
Si eres bueno con un rifle y no le temes a unos pocos mutantes, entonces tengo un trabajo para ti. ¿Estás interesado?

Rations are running low, and I need to keep everyone in camp's bellies full. Algunos de los tipos me traen una o dos muertes de vez en cuando. But it's been slow lately... So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. I kill and process the meat, right here in my kitchen. Tenga en cuenta que hacer que los mutantes se irriten hace que la carne sea más dura por la adrenalina. Además, cuanto menor sea el sangrado, mejor será la carne. Entonces, solo ten cuidado con tus disparos, ¿de acuerdo?
¡Genial, eres un buen cazador después de todo! Tengo pago por ti.
Encuentra %s
A Novikov le exige %s para instalar actualizaciones de equipos básicos, debe devolverlos a él si encuentra alguno.

It's really hard to come by tools here in the Zone. Sería capaz de realizar actualizaciones en una mayor variedad de equipos si puedo conseguir algunas herramientas nuevas. Si estás interesado, te diré lo que necesito.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas básicas. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
¡Hombre maravilloso! Aquí, déjame arrojarte algo de dinero.
Encuentra %s
%s son requeridos por Novikov para instalar actualizaciones avanzadas de equipos, debe traerlos de vuelta a él si encuentra alguno.
Realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste una buena mierda la última vez, pero necesito un set de mayor calidad. Si estás interesado, te diré lo que necesito.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas avanzadas. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
¡Has resucitado por mí una vez más! Aquí, déjame arrojarte algo de dinero.
Encuentra %s
A Novikov le exige %s para instalar actualizaciones de equipos expertos, debe devolverlos si encuentra alguno.
Realmente podría usar más herramientas. Me trajiste una buena mierda la última vez, pero necesito un set de mayor calidad. Si estás interesado, te diré lo que necesito.
Necesito un conjunto de herramientas expertas. Debe contener lo que necesito. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
¡Has resucitado por mí una vez más! Aquí, déjame arrojarte algo de dinero.

Usted es nuestro guía? Voy a marcar la ubicación en tu PDA. Lead the way, and we will follow. Después de que completemos nuestro análisis, escúpenos de regreso de manera segura. Háblame nuevamente cuando regresemos al campamento.
Yes. We should get moving. The longer we wait around, the more dangerous it gets.
Gracias, stalker. Hiciste bien tu trabajo. Aquí está tu pago.
Está bien.
Misterios de la Zona
You came to the Zone seeking to unravel its many mysteries. A familiar face may hold the answers that you seek.
El Hotel Polissya
La clave y las coordenadas que le dio el médico indican que Strelok escondió un alijo en una habitación del Hotel Polissya en Pripyat.
You have found the hotel at the coordinates you were given. Around here somewhere should be the room matching the inscription on the key.
Unos pocos objetos dispersos están llenos de basura en la habitación abandonada por Strelok. Deben ser investigados por posibles pistas.
Investigate the Agroprom underground
Investigate the Agroprom underground and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X18
Investigate laboratory X18 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X16
Investigate laboratory X16 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X19
Investigate laboratory X19 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate laboratory X8
Investigate laboratory X8 and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate the Jupiter underground
Investigate the Jupiter underground and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
Investigate the Chernobyl NPP
Investigate the Chernobyl NPP and search for hard evidence of a conspiracy.
